resources:
MTP Website %1$s isn\'t yet available, I\'m working on it, please wait %2$s more days %1$d問/%2$d問
%[flags][width][.precision][argsize]typechar is the template.
1 is a flag? $ is the width? # is the precision? num is the argsize? "str" is the typechar?
$s string $d decimal integer $f floating point number
